sub_topic: Probability of drawing a certain card from a deck of cards
message_1: What is the probability of drawing a Jack of Hearts from a well-shuffled deck of 52 cards?
message_2:
There is only 1 Jack of Hearts in a standard deck of 52 cards. Therefore, the probability of drawing the Jack of Hearts from a well-shuffled deck is:

1 (the number of Jack of Hearts) / 52 (the total number of cards in the deck) = 1/52 â‰ˆ 0.01923 or 1.923%

So, the probability of drawing a Jack of Hearts from a well-shuffled deck of 52 cards is approximately 1.923%.
